253a7a7f614e.title: Hey Zdravko, This was a wicked tale!

paragraphs.name: ec2d
paragraphs.text: Hey Zdravko, This was a wicked tale! I’m glad you thought to use the screen shot method, can’t go wrong with it.

virtuals.subtitle: But it’s sad when those who know better reproduce it as their own.

f3006c181d7c.title: I do believe a lot of people might share articles, forward them or retweet/republish and simply don…

content.subtitle: But it’s sad when those who know better reproduce it as their own.

paragraphs.name: af25
paragraphs.text: I do believe a lot of people might share articles, forward them or retweet/republish and simply don’t know how to (or that they should) credit the original author. Or they don’t know who the original author is. They may even suppose you were posting an article you found too. A lot of uncles and moms on Facebook are prone to that.

virtuals.subtitle: Yup, a scumbag — what a surprise!

bc52dc8db2d0.title: All you had to do was mention his name: “Mikey”

content.subtitle: Yup, a scumbag — what a surprise!

paragraphs.text: Yup, a scumbag — what a surprise!

989362d039ea.title: This is absolutely terrible, and I’m glad you stood up for yourself and made some noise.

paragraphs.name: ec69
paragraphs.text: This is absolutely terrible, and I’m glad you stood up for yourself and made some noise. Content creation is difficult and stealing from others is never okay. We already have enough of a hard time proving our importance in our respective industries — the last thing we need is someone stealing our hard work for views and profit.

paragraphs.name: 54c6
paragraphs.text: Good on you.

f44737279d0c.title: Not everyone who reads this will understand what it feels like to be minding your own business and…

paragraphs.name: eb05
paragraphs.text: Not everyone who reads this will understand what it feels like to be minding your own business and suddenly have a friend of yours, who has lots of followers, post your viral article saying it’s “Bloody brilliant” and you catch the exact same headline of your article…and see that it is in fact yours…only someone else has claimed they wrote it. You go…

f2182faea8fb.title: Wow, I think I saw “his” article on FB two weeks ago and thought, wait I thought that Z guy wrote…

paragraphs.name: e4af
paragraphs.text: Wow, I think I saw “his” article on FB two weeks ago and thought, wait I thought that Z guy wrote this piece… which made me question *your* credibility!!! So in my book, you may go so far as to say that you are actually the one wearing the cape in this scenario. Wow. What a piece of work he is. Just wow.

cd73633a7a8e.title: So ironic, this just happened to me today!

paragraphs.name: 733d
paragraphs.text: So ironic, this just happened to me today! I have been writing on Medium for about 9 months and my post on Saturday became popular really quick (in the thousands, not millions, but that’s pretty big in the audience I am writing for). My article ‘Empaths are not here to transmute other people’s energy’ was picked up by the website themindunleashed.com…

paragraphs.name: 8bbb
paragraphs.text: Sorry to hear that, that even more of a personal attack. Hope you got your justice.

paragraphs.name: 08e1
paragraphs.text: They slide not.

f0a1f50940ae.title: You wouldn’t believe how difficult it is for visual artists.

paragraphs.name: 6b35
paragraphs.text: You wouldn’t believe how difficult it is for visual artists. Few businesses will even pay for images anymore when they can be so easily stolen on the Internet. Furthermore, magazines and publishers won’t pay artists for their work when they publish. Everyone is supposed to be excited about the “free exposure” and somehow use that to pay their bills.

virtuals.subtitle: To re-write something is common, most times you are reading a dozen reports and writing in your own words what you think of something.

paragraphs.text: The whole point is not to say you are doing things, but to do them and let those things speak for themselves.

paragraphs.name: acdd
